mapper.update: update system_user_role set system_account_id = #{systemAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, del_flg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=BIT}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, system_account_id, role_id, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from system_user_role where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, system_account_id, role_id, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from system_user_role
